thread.title: EPA Chief Scott Pruitt’s Emails Show Close Ties With Oil and Gas Companies - WSJ
thread.title_full: EPA Chief Scott Pruitt’s Emails Show Close Ties With Oil and Gas Companies - WSJ

author: Amy Harder
title: EPA Chief Scott Pruitt’s Emails Show Close Ties With Oil and Gas Companies - WSJ
text:
EPA Chief Scott Pruitt’s Emails Show Close Ties With Oil and Gas Companies Pruitt has been tasked with repealing major climate and environmental regulations enacted by the Obama administration By @ailworth Updated Feb. 23, 2017 9:24 p.m. ET 
WASHINGTON—Thousands of newly released emails showing close contact between Scott Pruitt, the new chief of the Environmental Protection Agency, and oil and natural-gas companies are casting clouds over Mr. Pruitt’s newly minted leadership of the agency tasked with protecting the nation’s air and water. 
The emails, which cover a period when Mr. Pruitt was attorney general of Oklahoma, were released earlier this week after an order... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Most Popular Videos
